title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.2 - Required forms not supplied by the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 320.2 - Required forms not supplied by the department

State Regulations

Where the department requires a form to be used for a
specific purpose but does not supply it, the department will specify the basic
minimum requirements for the form. Local social services agencies shall be
responsible for supplying a form which meets the basic minimum requirements set
by the department. These forms shall not come under the approval requirements
of section
320.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
320.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
